DataElement.preferredName: Oral Medication For Pain Relief Contain Opioid Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to whether or not any of the oral medication administered for pain relief contained opioids.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Oral Medication For Pain Relief Contain Opioid Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pharmacological medication intended for administration through the mouth._The reason of something._A lessening of pain following an intervention._Include or hold; have within or as a component._A class of synthetic chemicals/drugs similar to opiates (opium derivatives) with analgesic properties.  Due to binding to opiate receptors, opioids mimic opiate activity on neurons, various cells (i.e. lymphocytes), pain suppression and other neurobehavioral activity. (NCI)_The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A pharmacological medication intended for administration through the mouth.

Concepts.definition: A pharmacological medication intended for administration through the mouth.

Concepts.definition: A lessening of pain following an intervention.
Include or hold; have within or as a component.

A class of synthetic chemicals/drugs similar to opiates (opium derivatives) with analgesic properties.  Due to binding to opiate receptors, opioids mimic opiate activity on neurons, various cells (i.e. lymphocytes), pain suppression and other neurobehavioral activity. (NCI)
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
